About Me

BIO

• Good skills and capable of working with various accounting and Server software’s such as: QuickBooks and Sage for accounting; Octopus Deploy, Rabbit MQ, Eclipse, MySQL, Windows Server 2012R2, Active Directory as mentioned above and more. • Good skills on managing and creating websites for tourism purposes, such as promoting and selling best holiday safaris worldwide. • Fast learner and Great Co-Worker. • Can work with Cross-Platform systems such as: Linux server/Desktop, IOS/OSX & Windows/All

• Movitel S.A.

Full Stack Developer

Position: Vice District Director / Technical Coordinator | Period: September / 2014 to January / 2018. Duties: Technical Operator of Telecommunication Networks, Working with: Optical Fiber, Microwave, BG20, DWDM, XDM300, OSN2500 & OSN800, 4cl, 3cl, 5.5kv, 10.5kv, 25kv Generators, DC Power Emerson, ZTE, Huawei & Ageisson, RF Modulo, RRU, RFU, CERRAGON, etc). • Indigo Safaris

Web designer and Software Manager

Position: Web designer and Software Manager | Period: 2017 -2019. Duties: Editing Websites and management of various software’s like: Ollami, Wetu, and Safari Bookings, to create and manage Safari Itineraries! .

• LaxtonGroup

Position: Technical Coordinator/Project Manager

| Period: In progress. Duties: Providing Services and Technical support to STAE (Technical Secretariat of Electoral Administration). Where we work with BRK’s (Biometric Registration Kits), and Windows Servers. Registering applicants for the upcoming elections and managing Data, in the whole Country. BRMS is the main software used within the BRK’s to run the mass registration possible. We also manage various software’s and programming languages such as: Windows PowerShell, SQL Server, Hamachi VPN, Apache Tomcat, Rabbit MQ, Octopus Deploy, etc. To manage Data in Provincial Servers throughout the Country.
